#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Campaigning for the American presidency is one of the most expensive exercises in the world .
#Text=How do you deal with the cost and fundraising ?
#Text=Well , it does n’t have to be .
#Text=I probably will have spent around $1,000-$ 3,000 for the 2 years of the campaign .
#Text=I ’m use to doing things without much money .
#Text=Is it effective ?
#Text=You asked me to do this interview !
#Text=And I have a waiting line !
#Text=This kind of campaign is made easier by the internet , the indie media , public access cable tv , etc. And it will probably get easier to do this kind of campaign in the next few years .
#Text=European mainstream press has covered our campaign quite a lot .
#Text=I expect that the mainstream press here will discover our campaign via Europe after the conventions .
#Text=So our campaign has no paid ads , no paid staff , no travel expenses [ I tie my campaign appearances to my performance tours ] , etc.
#Text=Our biggest expenses are things like buttons , bumper stickers , and booths at street festivals .
#Text=Historically the goal of independent and third-party candidates is not to “ win . ”
#Text=Realistically the process is rigged to prevent us from “ winning . ”
#Text=The function of such a candidate as I is to introduce ideas , to induce change , to raise the bar .
#Text=Within this context , my campaign is extremey effective .
#Text=But on the other hand , I JUST MAY WIN THIS SUCKER !
#Text=Do you have a running mate yet ?
#Text=Who are they ?
#Text=What are you/were you looking for in a running mate ?
#Text=My vice president is Susan Marilyn Block , Ph.D.

#Text=Part philosopher , part therapist , part humorist and part-time horny housewife , Dr. Susan M Block is a world-renowned sex educator , best-selling author , award-winning documentary filmmaker , art dealer , cable TV host and political activist .

#Text=A familiar face on HBO 's late-night programming through her #1 Nielsen-rated show , Radio Sex TV and her episodes on Real Sex , she also hosts The Dr. Susan Block Show , rated by The LA Weekly as “ The Best of LA Phone-In Shows , ” airing weekly on cable TV stations around the world , from Hollywood to the Holy Land .

#Text=A magna cum laude graduate of Yale University ( BA , Theater Studies , With Distinction ) , Block went on to study at UC Berkeley and San Francisco State , receiving her masters and doctorate in philosophy with an emphasis in psychology from Pacific Western .
#Text=Her first book , Advertising for Love , forecast the current online dating explosion .
#Text=Her second book , Being A Woman , a popularization of her doctoral thesis on Dr. Toni Wolfe ’s theory of feminine psychology , became a NY Times bestseller .
#Text=Her third book , The 10 Commandments of Pleasure has been published in 15 countries ( coming soon to Israel , where her cable TV show is a big hit ) .
#Text=Creator of the award-winning documentary series , Encyclopedia of Sex , Block is an active member of the Academy of Television Arts & Sciences .
#Text=She has been featured in numerous documentaries and appeared on multiple radio and TV shows , from Oprah to Today .
